title: 2022 Notables in Finance Q&A: 'Our mission is to make lives better' - Crain's Cleveland Business
content: 2022 Notables in Finance Q&A: 'Our mission is to make lives better'  Crain's Cleveland Business
description: 'Now the problem is you're buried with information,' says Randy Carver, president and CEO of Carver Financial Services. 'It's like drinking from a firehose. We try to get relevant information to people, and what's relevant to one is not to another.'
